markdownRemark.excerpt: Fireworks are a noble, traditional way to emphasize the greatness of an event. They command the epic. They are poetry in a dark night skyâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: Fireworks are a noble, traditional way to emphasize the greatness of an event. They command the epic. They are poetry in a dark night sky. They look good, smell strong, and are dangerous to play with. A bit like secret agents.

frontmatter.title: Fireworks
frontmatter.description: Fireworks are a noble, traditional way to emphasize the greatness of an event.
